title: Ein Morgen zu Hause
translation: Every morning at seven o’clock the alarm rings. Lena gets up and goes into the bathroom. She washes her face and brushes her teeth. Afterwards, she gets dressed and combs her hair. In the kitchen, it is already warm. Lena’s mother prepares breakfast. There is bread, butter, cheese, and tea. Sometimes there is also an egg and some jam. Lena likes to eat fruit and drink juice. The father reads the newspaper and Lena tells about school. After breakfast, everyone puts their plate and cup in the dishwasher. At eight o’clock, Lena and her brother leave. They walk to school together.
